name: NSScrubberDelegate
desc: A set of methods that a scrubber delegate implements to respond to user interactions.

items.name: func scrubber(NSScrubber, didSelectItemAt: Int)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the item at the specified index was selected.

items.name: func scrubber(NSScrubber, didHighlightItemAt: Int)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the item at the specified index was highlighted.

items.name: func scrubber(NSScrubber, didChangeVisibleRange: NSRange)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the range of items currently visible in the scrubber has changed.

items.name: func didBeginInteracting(with: NSScrubber)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that the user is panning or scrolling the scrubber.

items.name: func didFinishInteracting(with: NSScrubber)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a pan or scroll interaction with the scrubber has ended.

items.name: func didCancelInteracting(with: NSScrubber)
items.desc: Tells the delegate that a user interaction with the scrubber has been canceled.
